channel.title: Need help with adding portals
channel.description: I need help with adding circle portals that teleport you to a certain spot. need code thanks.

item.title: Need help with adding portals
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

Use this:

case 5082: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You teleport to Zanaris!!"); teleportToX = 2417; teleportToY = 4410; actionTimer = 20; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } }

The case number is the OBJECT IDâ€¦u just change message and coords.

Read full topic
